DOC.brief_title: Comparison Flutiform , Fluticasone Seretide Treatment Moderate Severe Asthma Paediatric Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This study involve 2-4 week run-in phase follow 12 week double blind treatment phase . During run-in phase , subject receive Flixotide . In treatment phase subject randomise one 3 treatment group receive active Flutiform placebo Flixotide Active Seretide placebo Flixotide active Flixotide either placebo seretide placebo Flutiform . Efficacy assess lung function test , asthma symptom , sleep disturbance due asthma rescue medication use . Safety assess adverse event , lab test , urinary cortisol vital sign .
